title: Lagos ville información
description: Anything related to the data or facts about the city of Lagos
narrative: A relevant document must be about the city of Lagos in Nigeria while a partially relevant document can be about the people, history, land etc. related to the city.

title: Water viviendo animaux
description: Anything related to the data or facts about marine animals
narrative: A relevant document must be about animals living in water while partially relevant documents can state important facts about them including how they survive, their taxonomy, history related, etc.

title: guerres fought por Israel
description: Anything related to various wars fought by Israel.
narrative: A relevant document must be about a war in which Israel was involved while a partially relevant document can be about Israel in general.

title: Venezuela económica crise
description: Anything related to economic situation of Venezuela
narrative: A relevant document must be about the economic condition in Venezuela while a partially relevant document can be about Venezuela as a country.

title: le sports en Europe
description: Anything related to sports played across europe.
narrative: A relevant document would be about a particular sport/s played in Europe while partially relevant documents are abouts sports played across the world.

title: utilisation de medicinales plants
description: Any document holding information about medicinal plants.
narrative: A relevant document talks about a particular kind or a group of medicinal plants or information about medicinal plants in general. A partially relevant document will be about medicines in general.

title: cancer traitement en India
description: Any document holding information the various forms of treatment for cancer particularly in India.
narrative: A relevant document would be the different types of cancer treatment available in India. A partially relevant document would be about cancer as a disease.

title: populaire english películas
description: Any document listing out popular english movies.
narrative: A relevant document would be about popular english movies with popular reviews (according to me). A partially relevant document would be about movies/facts about movies.

title: progrès in Commonwealth países
description: Any document talking about Commonwealth nations.
narrative: A relevant document would be one that talks about progress in Commonwealth nations. A partially relevant document would be about the Commonwealth (including games).

title: tenis à Wimbledon
description: Any document that talks about Wimbledon.
narrative: A relevant document would be about Wimbledon or results at wimbledon while a partially relevant document would be about tennis in general.
